reviews.review_text: Food was great. specially  bangada fish tandoori was delicious. captain vikas was great in helping. we ordered chicken thali and king fish thali. both were too tasty. we came from ahmedabad gujarat to visit ponda for friends wedding and found this place after searching on google. please try this place if you are in town for great seafood üòçand thank you captain Vikas.üëç

Excellent place to visit with family and groups for lunch/ dinner. It's known for the Bakasur Thali and Agadbam Thali.
Location is good, near to Sun Inn Hotel.
Parking is available on roadside.
Ambience is good, with small statues outside of fishermen, where you can click photos for Facebook and insta posts. Inside it is comfortable with good AC and nice comfortable seating. There is Bar section towards the right side.
Food: I tried the chicken Thali. It was very tasty and fulfilling. 2 chapatis are very good size. My stomach was full.
Service: The waiters are decent and good.
They provide finger bowl also after dinner

Had a mutton fry thali which was outstanding, kolhapuri style with 3 different ‚Äú rasas‚Äù the mutton was spiced just right with jawar rotis. I couldn‚Äôt finish the full thali. The attendant Neeraj was a polite and attractive young man. Loved the place (ample parking) will make it a regular stop.
